the bible). In the next town do the same thing but they are allowed to keep=

ed over 300 virgin girls for themselves. Its in the bible snowfire. Now can=

osed to do for these hebrew savage men? Sew? cook? They were raped snowfire=

ink of their memories of watching their mom and dad as the swords ran throu=
gh them, as they watched their moms head cut clean off=C2=A0and her brother=
 likely eaten for dinner. This all brought to you by the hebrew savage god.=

=C2=A0
I would ask that all well read individuals please consider "My Big =
Toe" by Thomas Campbell and snowfire put down your evp device as your bible=

ay from this group, or abstain from saving us from the debil. Now where can=

say a microchip....oh well close enough for Pastor Billy.
